title: Murray Gets Hot, Kawhi Stays Hot, Curry Not Looking So Hot | Heat Check
description:
An impressive scoring outburst from Jamal Murray helps the Denver Nuggets edge out the Portland Trail Blazers (3:45) while yet another dominant performance from Kawhi Leonard lifts the Toronto Raptors over a struggling Joel Embiid and the Philadelphia 76ers (16:28). A bizarre end-of-game sequence of events, including a missed Stephen Curry dunk, ensures the Houston Rockets an overtime victory over the Golden State Warriors (30:28) while the Milwaukee Bucks take back home-court advantage from the Boston Celtics by revving up their offense (42:50).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Tate Frazier, Danny Chau

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
